name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
review: Eita amar skin-ke khub bhalo hydrate koreche. Ektu sticky lage, kintu shukhiye gele thik hoye jay. Regular use-e khub bhalo result peyechi.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Moisturizer
review: Darun cream! Amar skin-er dullness kome geche ar glowing lagche. Kintu ektu beshi price, shobai kine uthte parbe na.

name: Salicylic Acid Cleanser
review: Amar acne-prone skin-er jonno khub bhalo kaj kore. Pore gulo clean thake. Kintu skin ektu dry kore dey.

name: Sunscreen SPF 50
review: Lightweight formula, skin-e bhalo absorb hoye jay. Kono white cast dei na, jeta khub bhalo laglo.

name: Niacinamide Serum
review: Pore-er size choto hoyeche ar oil control-o bhalo hoyeche. Kintu kichu din use korar por ektu irritation hoyechilo.
